mapper.select: select * from room r where id=#{roomId}
select * from room r where type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roomType},'%')
select * from room r where status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roomStatus},'%')
select * from room r where floor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{floor},'%')

select * from room r
or r.standardPrice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{room.standardPrice},'%') or r.vipPrice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{room.standardPrice},'%') or r.memberPrice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{room.standardPrice},'%') or r.discountPrice LIKE CONCAT('%',#{room.standardPrice},'%')
